review: My fire stick over heats and makes some crackling noise.  Apparently it's pretty common... just rebooting it fixes the frozen screen issue by disconnecting power and reconnecting.  Unfortunately, apps don't know where you stopped mid-movie or TV show. It's a pain... and it happens DAILY.Minus the overheating issue, it's great.  We purchased Sling TV too... Awesomeness!  If only it would work properly
